tool_description: Constructs a chronological timeline of events leading up to, during, and following a workplace incident to establish sequence and identify contributing factors.

incident_id.description: Unique identifier of the incident report

event_times.description: Array of timestamps for each event

event_descriptions.description: Descriptions of events corresponding to timestamps

event_sources.description: Sources of information for each event

error_messages: Array length mismatch: event_times and event_descriptions must have the same number of elements.
Invalid incident ID: Provide a valid incident_id that exists in the system.
Insufficient events: Timeline requires at least 2 events to construct.
Invalid timestamp format: All event_times must be valid ISO 8601 date-time format.
Events not chronological: Events must be provided in chronological order.
Missing event description: Each event must have a description of at least 5 characters.
Source array mismatch: If provided, event_sources array must match the number of events.
usage: Provide incident_id, event_times, and event_descriptions arrays with matching lengths and chronological order. Optionally include event_sources to document information sources. The tool will construct a detailed incident timeline.

total_events.description: Total number of events in the timeline

timeline_duration.description: Total time span covered by the timeline

key_events_identified.description: Number of key events identified in the sequence
